name: History GK
description: Indian GK is unlimited source of world history, India history, prehistory in Hindi language.   This application help you in IBPS, IAS, State PSC, SSC and any other government exams. It will be also useful for job seekers who are looking to get recruited by government firms or any government jobs or for any entrance exams.   Internet connectivity is not required at all to use this app.   Features :  Chapter 1 : World History - This section includes more than 15 sub chapters related to history of countries like USA, Russia, France, Germany & Italy.  Chapter 2 : Modern India History (Aadhunik Bharat) : We have included more than 9 chapters relating to modern india history.   Chapter 3 : Medieval India History (Madhyakalin Bharat) : Covered all questions related to medieval india   Chapter 4 : Ancient India (Prachin Bharat) : Questions and answers related to vedic civilization, harappa & mohen-jodaro.
